IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: EDUCATE STUDENTS BY LINKING KNOWLEDGE TO PROFESSIONAL PRACTICE.
IRS990.MissionDesc: PURPOSE: TRANSFORMING LIVES THROUGH EDUCATION MISSION: EDUCATE STUDENTS BY LINKING KNOWLEDGE TO PROFESSIONAL PRACTICE. VISION: A PREMIER UNIVERSITY FOR CHALLENGING STUDENTS TO ENHANCE THEIR GLOBAL COMPETENCIES AND 21ST CENTURY SKILLS, FOR SUCCESS IN A DIVERSE WORLD. STRATEGIC PRIORITIES: -CREATE AN ENVIRONMENT FOCUSED ON STUDENT SUCCESS. (STUDENTS) -GROW INNOVATIVE ACADEMIC PROGRAMS. (ACADEMICS) -OPTIMIZE OUR ORGANIZATIONAL CAPACITY. (PEOPLE) -STRENGTHEN AND INCREASE INSTITUTIONAL FINANCIAL SUSTAINABILITY. (FINANCES) -ENHANCE OUR CRITICAL INFRASTRUCTURE. (FACILITIES AND TECHNOLOGY) VALUES - ICARE INTERDEPENDENCE WE ARE AN INCLUSIVE AND CARING COMMUNITY THAT EMPHASIZES SERVICE AS A FOUNDATION OF SUCCESS. COMMUNICATION WE ENGAGE IN AUTHENTIC DIALOGUE, TIMELY EXCHANGES OF INFORMATION, AND FACT-DRIVEN DISCUSSION, CIVIL DEBATE, AND DECISION-MAKING. ACCOUNTABILITY WE MAKE ETHICAL, RESPONSIBLE DECISIONS THAT HAVE A HIGH DEGREE OF INTEGRITY, ARE DATA INFORMED, AND ARE RESULTS-ORIENTED. RESPECT
IRS990.Desc: STUDENTS HAVE ACCESS TO SOME OF THE BEST UNDERGRADUATE, GRADUATE, AND DEGREE COMPLETION PROGRAMS AND CAN DECIDE WHETHER TO PURSUE THEIR DEGREE ON CAMPUS, ONLINE, OR ENJOY A LITTLE BIT OF BOTH. SOME OF OUR MOST POPULAR PROGRAMS, MANY OF WHICH ARE NATIONALLY RECOGNIZED, INCLUDE HOMELAND SECURITY/TERRORISM; FORENSIC PSYCHOLOGY, FORENSIC SCIENCE, SPORTS AND RECREATION MANAGEMENT; EXERCISE SCIENCE, COMMUNICATION; AND BUSINESS MANAGEMENT, TO NAME A FEW.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE CONSERVATION EASEMENT IS NOT MATERIAL SO NOT REPORTED IN FOOTNOTE TO FINANCIAL STATEMENTS. IT IS NOT REFLECTED ON THE BALANCE SHEET AND THE EXPENSE IS COVERED BY OPERATIONS AND IS NOT MATERIAL.
DESCRIPTION OF ART COLLECTIONS TIFFIN UNIVERSITY CAPITALIZES CONTRIBUTIONS OF ART AND SIMILAR ASSETS WHEN RECEIVED. THESE COLLECTIONS ARE HELD FOR THE EDUCATION OF THE TIFFIN COMMUNITY.

THE UNIVERSITY'S ENDOWMENT FUND IS DESIGNATED FOR SCHOLARSHIPS, FUTURE CAPITAL EXPANSION PROJECTS, AND MAINTENANCE OF CURRENT FACILITIES. ASC (740) FOOTNOTE MANAGEMENT HAS EVALUATED THEIR INCOME TAX POSITIONS UNDER THE GUIDANCE INCLUDED IN ASC 740. BASED ON THEIR REVIEW, MANAGEMENT HAS NOT IDENTIFIED ANY MATERIAL UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS TO BE RECORDED OR DISCLOSED IN THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS.

Student Aid and Discounts $22,702,682 CHANGE IN BENEFICIAL INTEREST IN PERPETUAL TRUST $ 86,883 TOTAL $22,789,565

Student Aid and Discounts $22,702,682
THE NONDISCRIMINATION POLICY IS PUBLISHED ON OUR WEBSITE AND ON ALL MARKETING MATERIALS TO STUDENTS AND THE COMMUNITY.

TIFFIN UNIVERSITY RECEIVES FEDERAL AND STATE FINANCIAL AID FROM THE FOLLOWING GOVERNMENT AGENCIES: U.S. DEPARTMENT OF TREASURY, U.S. DEPARTMENT OF EDUCATION, STATE OF OHIO DEPARTMENT OF EDUCATION, OHIO TUITION TRUST, PENNSYLVANIA HIGHER EDUCATION, VERMONT STUDENT ASSISTANCE CORPORATION, STATE COUNCIL OF HIGHER EDUCATION FOR VIRGINIA AND VETERANS ADMINISTRATION.

TIFFIN UNIVERSITY DOES NOT AWARD GRANTS OUTSIDE THE UNITED STATES. ATHLETIC AND ACADEMIC SCHOLARSHIPS, AS WELL AS APPLICABLE HEERF GRANTS ARE AWARDED TO INTERNATIONAL STUDENTS STUDYING ON CAMPUS. THESE AWARDS ARE MONITORED BY THE DIRECTOR OF STUDENT ACCOUNTS AND AWARDED BY THE FINANCIAL AID DEPARTMENT.

THE UNIVERSITY CONTRACTED JEROLD PANAS LINZY AND PARTNERS TO PROVIDE CAPITAL CAMPAIGN CONSULTING SERVICES DURING THE YEAR. Tiffin University contracted Ruffalo Noel Levitz to provide fundraising consulting services during the year

MANAGEMENT DETERMINES THE ANNUAL GUIDELINE AMOUNT OF SCHOLARSHIPS AND DISCOUNTS. AWARDS ARE BASED ON VARIOUS CRITERIA AND TRACKED WITH BOARD APPROVED BUDGET. MONTHLY GENERATED REPORTS ARE USED TO MONITOR AWARDS PROGRAM. INDEPENDENT AUDITORS REVIEW ACCURACY OF FINANCIAL AID AWARDS AND RECIPIENTS' RECORDS. FUNDS ARE DISTRIBUTED BASED ON NEED AND MERIT. STUDENT AID IS HANDLED BY THE FINANCIAL AID DEPARTMENT AND CREDITED DIRECTLY TO THE STUDENT ACCOUNT. EACH STUDENT APPLIES FOR FINANCIAL AID BY FILLING OUT A FREE APPLICATION FOR FEDERAL STUDENT AID (FAFSA). THE AWARD IS BASED ON THE INFORMATION IN THIS APPLICATION. STUDENTS CAN ALSO APPLY FOR GRANTS AND SCHOLARSHIPS BASED ON ELIGIBILITY.

LILLIAN SCHUMACHER, UNIVERSITY PRESIDENT, USES MOHAWK COUNTRY CLUB TO FACILITATE MEETINGS WITH PROSPECTIVE DONORS. THIS IS FOR BUSINESS USE ONLY AND IS SUBSTANTIATED PER THE ACCOUNTABLE PLAN RULES. IT IS NON-TAXABLE. PRESIDENT LILLIAN SCHUMACHER RESIDES IN A UNIVERSITY OWNED HOUSE. THE MAJORITY OF THE HOUSE IS USED FOR UNIVERSITY FUNCTIONS INCLUDING RECEPTIONS, DINNERS AND OTHER BUSINESS EVENTS. THE FAIR MARKET VALUE OF THE PRESIDENT'S APARTMENT LOCATED IN THE SECOND LEVEL OF THE HOUSE HAS BEEN INCLUDED ON SCHEDULE J. THE FAIR MARKET VALUE OF THE HOUSING IS INCLUDED ON THE W-2 AS TAXABLE COMPENSATION.
THE AMOUNTS LISTED IN PART I, COLUMN B ARE BASED ON THE NUMBER OF CONTRIBUTORS FOR EACH TYPE OF PROPERTY CONTRIBUTED.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 1B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: LENNY CLOUSE AND DAN REINEKE ARE CONSIDERED NON-INDEPENDENT VOTING MEMBERS OF THE BOARD DUE TO BUSINESS TRANSACTIONS REPORTED ON SCHEDULE L.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: TIFFIN UNIVERSITY'S FORM 990 IS REVIEWED BY THE ASSOCIATE VICE PRESIDENT FOR FINANCE/CONTROLLER, VICE PRESIDENT FOR FINANCE AND ADMINISTRATION, PRESIDENT AND AN INDEPENDENT ACCOUNTING FIRM. A PUBLIC INSPECTION COPY OF THE FORM 990 IS ALSO PROVIDED TO THE FULL GOVERNING BODY BEFORE FILING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ANNUAL WRITTEN AND SIGNED DISCLOSURE IS REQUIRED BY EACH OFFICER, TRUSTEE, AND KEY EMPLOYEE ON TIFFIN UNIVERSITY'S CONFLICT OF INTEREST FORM. IF A CONFLICT EXISTS, RESTRICTIONS WILL BE IMPOSED ON PERSONS WITH A CONFLICT SUCH AS PROHIBITING THEM FROM PARTICIPATING IN THE GOVERNING BODY'S DELIBERATIONS AND DECISIONS IN THE TRANSACTIONS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE PRESIDENT'S COMPENSATION IS DETERMINED BY THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE. THE LAST REVIEW OF THE PRESIDENT'S COMPENSATION WAS IN 2022.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE OFFICERS' COMPENSATION IS DETERMINED BY THE PRESIDENT. THE LAST REVIEW OF THE OFFICERS COMPENSATION WAS IN 2022.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: TIFFIN UNIVERSITY KEEPS ITS GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ON SITE, AND THEY ARE MADE AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST.
